title: Research Topic: Trump Administration Crypto Enforcement Dismantling: Policy Reversals and Industry Capture April-July 2025
summary:
Based on the research priority 'Trump Administration Crypto Enforcement Dismantling: Policy Reversals and Industry Capture April-July 2025', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document systematic dismantling of cryptocurrency oversight under Trump administration:
- April 2025: Dissolution of National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team
- David Sacks appointment as crypto czar w... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
